Package org.example.capy.ui

Interface UIElement

public interface UIElement
A UI element of the Editor (e.g. a text field, or line number)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    draw()
    Draw the element to the Terminal
    Position
    getScreenCursor()
    Get the current *absolute* position of the Screen Cursor

    needsRedraw()
    Determine if a redraw is necessary

    Change the size of the UIElement

  • Method Details

    • draw

      void draw()
      Draw the element to the Terminal

    • resize

      void resize(int newRows, int newCols)
      Change the size of the UIElement
      Parameters:
      newRows - The number of rows the element will occupy following the resize
      newCols - The number of rows the element will occupy following the resize

    • setPosition

      void setPosition(Position position)
      Set the position of the UI element
      Parameters:
      position - New position to move element to

    • needsRedraw

      boolean needsRedraw()
      Determine if a redraw is necessary
      Returns:
      True if a redraw is required

    • getScreenCursor

      Position getScreenCursor()
      Get the current *absolute* position of the Screen Cursor
      Returns:
      The absolute position of the Screen Cursor
